translations: 阐明，说明（elucidate 的过去式）

sentences.sentence: He elucidated a point of grammar.
sentences.translation: 他解释了一个语法要点。

sentences.sentence: The notion of (arch) angels is elucidated in the last chapter of the Lightworker series (' Your Light Self ').
sentences.translation: (大)天使的概念在光工作者系列的最后一章“你们自己的光(Your Light Self)”中有解释。

sentences.sentence: Contaldi concedes that the OPERA team may have made more of an effort to synchronize its clocks than it elucidated in the first draft of the paper.
sentences.translation: 卡洛·康泰迪承认，OPERA团队可能在论文第一稿中所阐明的基础上，作了更多的努力来同步时钟。
